entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
